mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.parent_id, t.status, t.package_info, t.record_datetime, t.package_path, t.package_name FROM `t_record_info` t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_record_info` (id, parent_id, status, package_info, record_datetime, package_path, package_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{status}, #{packageInfo}, #{recordDateTime}, #{packagePath}, #{packageName} )
